TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SolidBrush extends System.Drawing.Brush

Docs.summary: Defines a brush of a single color. Brushes are used to fill graphics shapes, such as rectangles, ellipses, pies, polygons, and paths. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This class inherits from the <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> class.
## Examples
- The following code example adds a shadow to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> using a <xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush>.
This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form. To run this example, paste this code into a form and call the `AddShadow` method when handling the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event. Make sure the form contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> named `listBox1`.
[!code-cpp[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/VB/form1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Drawing.Color color) cil managed

Docs.param: A structure that represents the color of this brush.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new object of the specified color.

remarks.format:
## Examples
- The following code example adds a shadow to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> using a <xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush>.
This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form. To run this example, paste this code into a form and call the `AddShadow` method when handling the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event. Make sure the form contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> named `listBox1`.
[!code-cpp[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/VB/form1.vb#3)]
